Hero.title: A Modern Next.js Full Stack SaaS Boilerplate
Hero.description: Our Next.js boilerplate includes authentication, Stripe payments, AI integration, CMS, and everything you need to start earning immediately.

Features.title: Production-ready Next.js SaaS Boilerplate
Features.description: The Next.js boilerplate includes every essential feature modern SaaS applications require, letting you focus on your unique business logic and customer value.

moreFeatures.title: Explore More Features
moreFeatures.description: Discover our complete feature roadmap, detailed documentation, and upcoming enhancements that will accelerate your SaaS development journey.

items.title: Authentication
items.description: Integrated Supabase authentication with multiple sign-in options.

details.title: Social Sign-in
details.description: Google, GitHub, and more.

details.title: Magic Links
details.description: Email verification with magic links.

details.title: Bot Protection
details.description: Protect your app from bots with Cloudflare Turnstile.

items.title: Payment System
items.description: Complete billing solution with Stripe Checkout and Stripe's Billing Portal.

details.title: All Payment Methods
details.description: Nexty supports monthly and annual subscriptions, and one-time payments.

details.title: Usage-based Billing
details.description: Nexty supports usage-based billing for apps that need to charge users based on their usage.

details.title: Smart Admin Management
details.description: Nexty's pricing plans are managed through the admin dashboard, bound to Stripe Price IDs for intelligent, secure, and real-time preview capabilities.

items.title: AI Capabilities
items.description: Complete AI integration toolkit with interactive demos, multi-provider support, and ready-to-deploy AI image generation website template.

details.title: AI Demo Hub
details.description: Nexty includes built-in demos for chat, text-to-image, image-to-image, and video generation to help developers learn AI workflows and test models quickly.

details.title: Universal AI Provider Support
details.description: Nexty offers AI SDK integration supporting GPT, Claude, Gemini, DeepSeek, Grok, OpenRouter, and Replicate for maximum flexibility.

details.title: Bonus:  AI Image Generation Website
details.description: Nexty paid users receive a complete Flux Kontext AI image generation website template for rapid deployment of AI art platforms.

items.title: CMS
items.description: Advanced CMS going beyond basic content management with paywall protection, AI translation, and multi-purpose publishing capabilities.

details.title: Content Access Control
details.description: Nexty's CMS supports public, logged-in users, and subscriber-only content with paywall protection for monetized content sites.

details.title: AI-Powered Translation
details.description: Nexty's CMS includes built-in AI translation for multilingual content creation, plus duplicate feature for efficient content production workflows.

details.title: Multi-Purpose Publishing
details.description: Nexty's CMS enables both free blog sites and paid content platforms with advanced status management (draft, published, archived).

items.title: File Storage
items.description: Enterprise-grade file management powered by Cloudflare R2 with admin dashboard, automatic CDN distribution, and optimized upload workflows.

details.title: Admin File Management
details.description: Nexty provides a dedicated admin dashboard for comprehensive file management with upload, delete, and organization capabilities.

details.title: Cloudflare R2 Integration
details.description: Nexty leverages Cloudflare R2 for cost-effective, high-performance file storage with automatic CDN distribution worldwide.

details.title: Optimized Upload Experience
details.description: Nexty features drag-and-drop uploads, preview functionality, and automatic file processing for seamless user experience.

items.title: Visual Pricing Management
items.description: Nexty introduces dashboard pricing management that's secure and convenient, update your pricing without touching code.

details.title: Real-Time Preview
details.description: Nexty's pricing card editor includes real-time preview, enabling you to see how pricing cards will look before saving.

details.title: Stripe Integration
details.description: Nexty fetches pricing data from Stripe with one-click verification for accurate billing setup.

details.title: Multi-language Support
details.description: Nexty supports AI-powered translation for pricing cards, enabling easy management of multilingual pricing content.

items.title: Email System
items.description: Complete email solution with Cloudflare domain email and Resend integration for professional communications and subscriber management.

details.title: Professional Domain Email
details.description: Nexty implements domain email through Cloudflare, making your brand appear more professional and helping build trust with users.

details.title: Advanced Email Marketing
details.description: Nexty includes Resend integration for subscriber management and email campaigns, with built-in newsletter subscription module in the footer.

details.title: Built-in Email Automation
details.description: Nexty includes newsletter subscription and payment failure notification emails, plus pre-built templates for essential user communications.

items.title: User Dashboard
items.description: Complete user dashboard that provides a seamless experience for users.

details.title: Profile Management
details.description: Nexty includes comprehensive profile settings.

details.title: Subscription Management
details.description: Nexty provides subscription management with billing history and plan upgrades through Stripe integration.

details.title: Credit History & Usage
details.description: Nexty tracks credit grants and usage with detailed history, supporting both one-time and subscription-based credit systems.

items.title: Admin Dashboard
items.description: Comprehensive admin dashboard providing full control over users, pricing, content, and files for complete SaaS management.

details.title: User Management
details.description: Nexty provides complete user management with role control, Stripe customer integration, and account administration.

details.title: Pricing Management
details.description: Nexty offers visual pricing plan management with environment separation, Stripe integration, and real-time preview.

details.title: CMS & File Management
details.description: Nexty includes blog management with multilingual support, access control, and R2 file management with preview capabilities.

items.title: Marketing & Growth
items.description: Complete growth toolkit with internationalization, analytics, advertising, and SEO optimization for global reach and business success.

details.title: i18n
details.description: Nexty supports multiple languages out-of-the-box with easy expansion for worldwide market reach.

details.title: Analytics & AdSense
details.description: Nexty includes Google Analytics, Plausible tracking, and AdSense integration for insights and revenue generation.

details.title: SEO Optimization
details.description: Nexty provides comprehensive SEO optimization with meta tags and sitemaps for better rankings.

UseCases.title: One Boilerplate, Multiple Solutions
UseCases.description: Whether you're building AI tools, content platforms, or other SaaS products, our Next.js SaaS boilerplate adapts to your specific needs with minimal configuration required.

cases.title: AI-Powered SaaS Tools
cases.description: Launch production-ready AI applications in days, not months. Built-in integrations with OpenRouter, Replicate, and leading AI providers. Includes smart usage tracking, automated billing, and everything you need to monetize AI workflows.

cases.title: Content & Blog Platforms
cases.description: Launch SEO-optimized content websites with advanced CMS capabilities. Features include Markdown editing, multilingual support, paywall protection, AI translation, and AdSense integration. Perfect for building premium content platforms, newsletters, or content-driven SaaS applications.

cases.title: Subscription & Marketplace Platforms
cases.description: Build recurring revenue businesses with automated billing, customer management, and payment processing. Features include subscription management, usage-based pricing, customer portals, and comprehensive analytics. Perfect for SaaS marketplaces, subscription services, or premium tool platforms.

cases.title: Free Tools & Lead Magnets
cases.description: Create viral free tools that drive massive organic traffic. Lightning-fast performance and SEO optimization. Perfect for building your email list, generating leads, or creating the next viral calculator/converter tool.

Testimonials.title: Our Customers Rapidly Launched AI Tools & SaaS Products
Testimonials.description: Real success stories from developers and entrepreneurs who used Nexty to accelerate their SaaS development and achieve faster time-to-market.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Common questions about our Next.js SaaS boilerplate and how it can help you build better applications faster

items.question: What technical knowledge do I need to use this template?
items.answer: Nexty is an AI-friendly template that caters to all skill levels. If you're new to programming, you can leverage AI-assisted development to implement your requirements. For developers familiar with React and Next.js, you'll find the template particularly intuitive. We provide comprehensive documentation and examples - reviewing these resources first will significantly enhance your development experience.

items.question: Is technical support included with purchase?
items.answer: Absolutely! Technical support is included with all versions. Pro users receive 24/7 email support, while Enterprise customers benefit from dedicated one-on-one support with our technical team.

items.question: Does the template include all features shown in the demo?
items.answer: Yes, every feature showcased in our demo is fully implemented and production-ready in the template. If you have specific feature requests, our team is open to discussing potential additions to future releases.

items.question: Does the template support subscription billing?
items.answer: Yes, Nexty fully supports recurring subscription functionality. You can customize the subscription components and configure pricing tiers according to your business needs.

items.question: Is multilingual support available?
items.answer: Yes, Nexty comes with built-in internationalization support. The template includes English, Chinese, and Japanese out of the box, and you can easily extend it to support additional languages as needed.

items.question: How do I manage pricing plans?
items.answer: This is one of Nexty's standout features. You can manage pricing plans directly through the Dashboard, including creating, editing, and removing pricing tiers. The template includes AI-powered translation capabilities, eliminating the need for manual language file configuration.

items.question: What AI capabilities are built into the template?
items.answer: The template comes with integrated AI image generation and conversational AI features. It's designed to seamlessly integrate with leading AI providers including OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, Grok & DeepSeek, enabling you to easily build AI-powered applications.

CTA.title: Launch Your Product Fast, and Earn Money Fast
CTA.description: Stop starting from scratch! Use Nexty templates to focus on your core idea, rapidly build, validate, and start earning.

Pricing.title: Ship your SaaS in days, not months
Pricing.description: Using our battle-tested SaaS starter template, so you can skip boilerplate coding and focus on the features your users actually need.
